Name: Secrets of Magic 3: Happy Halloween
About the game: Victoria has become a teacher at Mystic Academy of Magic and your creativity is needed to help her decorate the schoolhouse for Halloween. Match your way through this fun and phantasmal adventure game, overcome tough obstacles, use power-ups to help you win gold to buy amazing Halloween decoration items and unlock new items as you progress in your game. Are you up for this spooky challenge? Features Get into the Halloween mood with this clever match 3 game Fun gameplay with tons of challenge levels Plan your moves, race against time or play it relaxed Collect gold to buy Halloween decoration items Tough obstacles and cool power ups Play Secrets of Magic: The Book of Spells / Play Secrets of Magic 2: Witches and Wizards /
